Synopsis:
---------
Barbara (Judi Dench) is a despotic and solitary teacher who rules her classroom with an iron fist in a dilapidated public secondary school in London. She lives alone with her ??cat Portia , has no friends, but his life undergoes a radical change when he meets Sheba Hart ( Blanchett), the exciting new art teacher at the school.Barbara sees in it the soul mate and loyal friend who has always been looking for. But when he discovers that Sheba maintains a torrid affair with one of her young students (Andrew Simpson), the fledgling friendship gives an ominous turn, as Barbara threatens to tell all Sheba's husband (Bill Nighy) and the whole world.
